message:
Free event on working remotely, and the challenges / opportunities that comes with it. Has a few of the top speakers and evangelists of remote work culture, including but not limited to Jason Fried of 37signals / Basecamp the author of 'Rework', Jennifer Weinmann of Toptal, Tom Willmot of Human Made 

http://www.outofoffice.hm/

Happening on the 29th of November, reserve your spot :)
story: Shady Sharaf shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Join us online on Nov 29th to watch Out-of-Office a remote work event
caption: outofoffice.hm
description: Letâ€™s start a conversation about how our working lives are changing. Learn from the experience of industry leaders at some of the top remote companies such as Toptal, Basecamp, Human Made and Buffer. The event is free - register to save your spot as viewer numbers are limited.
